DOC.brief_title: A Study of Preoperative Radiation Therapy and Capecitabine in Locally Advanced Rectal Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose of this trial is to study the efficacy of preoperative radiation therapy and capecitabine in locally advanced rectal cancer.
DOC.criteria: Biopsy proven rectal cancer Transmural rectal wall invasion Karnofsky performance status >70 Normal bone marrow, liver and kidney function Distant metastases Prior pelvic radiation Inflammatory bowel disease Severe ischemic heart disease Anticoagulant therapy Pregnancy
